document.full_text: talks in yemen to broker a transition from president ali abdullah saleh to his opponents have stalled in a public game of brinkmanship, but sources close to the talks said on monday a deal was still within reach.
document.title: yemen handover talks stall but deal within reach
lines_and_colors: talks in yemen to broker a transition from president ali abdullah saleh to his opponents have stalled in a public game of brinkmanship, but sources close to the talks said on monday a deal was still within reach.
